translations: n.方面；空间，大小；维度，层面（dimension 的复数）
v.将……做成特定尺寸；（在图表上）标出尺寸（dimension 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: We measured the dimensions of the kitchen.
sentences.translation: 我们测量了厨房的大小。

sentences.sentence: Drilling will continue on the site to assess the dimensions of the new oilfield.
sentences.translation: 钻探还将继续在现场进行以估测新油田的大小。

sentences.sentence: The dimensions of the market collapse, in terms of turnover and price, were certainly not anticipated.
sentences.translation: 股市崩盘的规模，无论从成交量还是价格来看，都是出乎意料的。
